channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.2.4
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 11.4 with PostGIS 2.5.2

PostgreSQL 12beta2 is available separately and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html

If you use other versions of PostgreSQL beside 11, please don't install this update. Download the new version from postgresapp.com/downloads.html instead. Normally Postgres.app should automatically download the correct update, but due to a bug in 2.2.3, it always shows the version with PostgreSQL 11 only.
